description: State variable for power flow. Load convention is used for flow direction. This means flow out from the TopologicalNode into the equipment is positive.

contents.name: Terminal
contents.description: The terminal associated with the power flow state variable.

contents.name: p
contents.description: The active power flow. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a TopologicalNode (bus) into the conducting equipment.

contents.name: q
contents.description: The reactive power flow. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a TopologicalNode (bus) into the conducting equipment.
